The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 102 - 101 , in Game 6 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Friday evening . The Cavs got out to a good start at home , with a 34 - 19 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on through the second , where they outscored the Cavs by 9 , to take a 57 - 46 lead by halftime . The 76ers came out strong in the third and outscored the Cavs by 9 in the quarter , to take a 82 - 80 lead into the final frame . LeBron_James led the Cavs with 25 points , 14 assists , 8 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block , in 36 minutes . Kevin_Love followed up with 20 points , 11 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , while Channing_Frye added 11 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Cavs shot 41 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 38 from long range . Meanwhile , Joel_Embiid led the 76ers with 22 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , 6 rebounds , 4 blocks , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 25 minutes . Ersan_Ilyasova followed up with 21 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Jahlil_Okafor tallied 14 points , 5 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 steal , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Sixers shot 41 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 35 from long range .
The Houston Rockets ( 56 - 26 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 38 - 44 ) 117 - 91 on Monday at the Toyota_Center in Houston . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three_point line , while the Jazz went 38 percent from the floor and just 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets were also able to force the Jazz into 18 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own . James_Harden went 3 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 16 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and 10 assists as well . Terrence_Jones also played a factor in the win , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) , 3 assists and 3 blocked shots in 20 minutes . Dwight_Howard had 14 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and 8 rebounds in 21 minutes , while Josh_Smith had 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) , 2 rebounds and 3 steals in 18 minutes . Bryce_Cotton went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 14 points , to go along with 3 assists . Rodney_Hood was the starter at shooting guard and finished with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , 2 assists and 1 block in 22 minutes . Chris_Johnson chipped in with 13 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) and 2 rebounds , while Jeremy_Evans added 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 1 3PT , 2 - 0 FT ) and 2 steals .

The Wizards offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 51 percent from the field and 36 percent from three_point range while holding Los_Angeles to 51 percent from the field and 26 percent from long range . Otto_Porter_Jr. amassed 16 points and 4 rebounds . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. led the bench with 14 points and 5 boards . The Lakers ( 21 - 53 ) were led by D'Angelo_Russell , as he collected 28 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists . Jordan_Clarkson amassed 22 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Julius_Randle accumulated 6 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists .

The Hawks were also able to force the Bucks into 19 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own . The Nets ( 2 - 3 ) checked in to Saturday 's contest having lost 4 of their last 5 contests , but they knew they 'd come out on top against a struggling Pistons ( 3 - 2 ) squad . Detroit jumped ahead 38 - 30 in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Detroit jumped to a 38 - 30 lead in the first quarter , but Detroit stormed back to take a 71 - 55 lead at the break . The Hawks ended up shooting 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from three_point range while holding the Nets to 40 percent from the field and 30 percent from long range . The Hawks ( 22 - 16 ) were led by Dennis_Schroder , as he tallied 19 points , 10 assists and 2 steals . Paul_Millsap accrued 14 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 blocks . Paul_Millsap finished with 14 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 blocks . Kris_Humphries led the bench with 13 points and 8 rebounds . The Nets ( 8 - 29 ) were led by Brook_Lopez , as he tallied 20 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Bojan_Bogdanovic accumulated 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Bojan_Bogdanovic tallied 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Sean_Kilpatrick led the bench with 14 points and 5 rebounds .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 120 - 112 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday evening . The Heat got out to a good start at home , with a 28 - 21 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on through the second , where they outscored the visitors by 5 , to take a 52 - 52 lead by halftime . The Heat picked it up in the third , as they outscored the Pelicans by 4 in the quarter , to take a 79 - 79 lead into the final frame . Goran_Dragic led the Heat with 33 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 32 minutes . Hassan_Whiteside tallied 20 points , 17 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal , while Wayne_Ellington chipped in 19 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 51 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Anthony_Davis led the Pelicans with 27 points , 8 rebounds , 3 steals , 3 blocks and 1 assist , in 35 minutes . DeMarcus_Cousins followed up with 19 points , 9 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 assist , while Jrue_Holiday tallied 11 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 block . The Pelicans shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 22 from long range .

The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Los_Angeles recording 24 assists to 13 turnovers , while Minnesota committed 13 turnovers to just 21 assists . Andrew_Wiggins led the Timberwolves in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Zach_LaVine was second on the team , finishing with 18 points , 3 rebounds and 7 assists . Gorgui_Dieng recorded a double_double off the bench , totaling 14 points and 10 rebounds . Blake_Griffin was the player of the game , as he accumulated 26 points , 8 rebounds and 8 assists . Chris_Paul finished second on the team , accruing 20 points , 2 rebounds and 9 assists . JJ_Redick amassed 18 points and 2 rebounds . DeAndre_Jordan scored just 9 points , but provided 9 rebounds and 1 blocks .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Miami Heat , 116 - 107 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday evening . The Magic ( 21 - 36 ) and the Heat ( 24 - 32 ) played a very intense game that went down to the wire , but it was n't decided until the final minutes . Orlando jumped to a 36 - 28 lead in the first quarter , but Orlando stormed back to make it a 3 - point game at the break . Evan_Fournier was the best player for the Magic in this game , as he finished with 24 points and 4 assists . Nikola_Vucevic had 13 points , 17 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals . Elfrid_Payton had 20 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists off the bench . Elfrid_Payton added 20 points , 5 boards and 4 assists off the bench . Evan_Fournier was the top scorer for the Heat , as he finished with 24 points and 4 assists . Hassan_Whiteside had 12 points and 19 rebounds . Goran_Dragic filled the stat sheet nicely after finishing with 22 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Hassan_Whiteside had 12 points and 19 rebounds . Tyler_Johnson had 13 points off the bench .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 31 - 41 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 55 - 18 ) 115 - 100 on Monday at Time_Warner_Cable_Arena in Charlotte . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three_point line , while the Hawks went 43 percent from the floor and 43 percent from beyond the arc . The Hornets were also able to force the Hawks into 10 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own . Kemba_Walker went 7 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 21 points , while also adding 5 rebounds and 6 assists . Gerald_Henderson on the other hand shot 9 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three_point line to score 20 points , while also adding 5 rebounds and 4 assists . In 22 minutes off the bench , Mo_Williams went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score 18 points in 22 minutes . Mo_Williams also had a nice game off the bench , scoring 18 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and handing out 4 assists in 22 minutes . Both John_Jenkins and PJ_Hairston reached double_figures as well , scoring 17 and 12 points respectively .

Danilo_Gallinari tallied 17 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists .

The Pelicans ( 19 - 30 ) were led by Jrue_Holiday , as he tallied 30 points , 2 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks on 13 - of - 21 from the field . Anthony_Davis collected 18 points , 17 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 blocks . Buddy_Hield amassed 15 points and 6 rebounds while E'Twaun_Moore led the bench with 17 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists . The Raptors ( 30 - 19 ) were led by Kyle_Lowry , as he tallied 33 points , 4 rebounds and 10 assists . Jonas_Valanciunas finished with 20 points and 12 boards . Norman_Powell started and accrued 18 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Norman_Powell finished with 10 points and 8 rebounds .
The Miami Heat ( 31 - 36 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 44 - 22 ) 108 - 104 on Tuesday at American_Airlines_Arena in Miami . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out_scoring the Trail_Blazers 32 - 27 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Heat were able to use a strong second half where they out - scored the Trail_Blazers 60 - 47 , to coast to a victory in front of their home fans . The Heat were able to force the Trail_Blazers into 15 turnovers , while committing just 8 of their own . Dwyane_Wade went 13 - for - 26 from the field and 6 - for - 6 from the free_throw line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding 6 assists . Luol_Deng on the other hand shot 9 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score 24 points . He recorded 24 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 4 - 4 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) and 4 rebounds in 36 minutes . Hassan_Whiteside recorded 12 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 6 blocks , while Arron_Afflalo added 15 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and 3 rebounds . LaMarcus_Aldridge went 15 - for - 24 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding 12 rebounds . Damian_Lillard on the other hand finished with 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 1 - 3 FT ) of his own , to go along with 3 rebounds and 3 assists . He 's now averaging 16 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists on the year .

The Warriors shot 47 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 30 from long range . Greg_Monroe was 1 of those players , as he went 8 - for - 13 from the field and 8 - for - 9 from the free_throw line to score a team - high of 24 points , while also grabbing 8 rebounds . Josh_Smith had a strong showing as well , posting 21 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 0 - 0 3PT , 3 - 5 FT ) , 13 rebounds and 5 blocks . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Andre_Drummond recorded his third double_double of the year , as he finished with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 FT ) and 10 rebounds . Both Kyle_Singler and Kyle_Singler reached double_figures as well , scoring 12 and 11 points respectively . Rudy_Gay led the way , going 6 - for - 22 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from beyond the arc to score 20 points , while also grabbing 8 rebounds and 8 assists . The only other King in double_figures was Ben_McLemore , who chipped in with 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) and 6 rebounds as well .

The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 107 - 79 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday evening . The Thunder ( 16 - 15 ) and the Jazz ( 14 - 18 ) engaged in quite a battle that was n't decided during the final minutes of the fourth quarter . Utah jumped to a 25 - 9 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Utah won the second quarter 28 - 9 , and they won the remaining 2 quarters ( 34 - 23 and 34 - 19 and 30 - 19 , respectively ) to walk away with a huge 28 - point win that puts them over .500 . Carmelo_Anthony had 18 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists , while Paul_George contributed 18 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . They kept the pressure on in the second , where they outscored the visitors by 18 , to take a 66 - 46 lead by halftime . The Hawks stayed in control through the third , as they outscored the Hawks by 7 in the quarter , to take a 91 - 76 lead into the final frame . Russell_Westbrook led the Thunder with 23 points , 10 assists , 9 rebounds and 1 steal , in 31 minutes . Alex_Abrines followed up with 21 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist , while Dennis_Schroder added 21 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist . The Thunder shot 52 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 41 from deep . Meanwhile , John_Collins led the Hawks with 19 points , 11 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block , in 33 minutes . Taurean_Prince tallied 15 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , while Trae_Young tallied 9 points , 8 assists and 4 rebounds . The Hawks shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 36 from long range .
